etymology.description: 夕(xī, "evening") + 卩(jié, "kneeling person") = related to evening activities or ceremonies
etymology.interpretation: The character combines 夕(xī, "evening"), depicting the time of day, with 卩(jié, "kneeling person"), possibly indicating a person engaged in a significant action or ceremony during the evening.

examples.chinese: 在造字过程中(在造字過程中)，㚇担负着声旁的作用(㚇擔負著聲旁的作用)。
examples.pinyin: Zài zàozì guòchéng zhōng, zōng dānfù zhe shēngpáng de zuòyòng.
examples.english: In the process of character formation, 㚇 plays the role of the phonetic component.

examples.chinese: 古代文献中(古代文獻中)，学者探讨了㚇的演变(學者探討了㚇的演變)。
examples.pinyin: Gǔdài wénxiàn zhōng, xuézhě tànjiù le zōng de yǎnbiàn.
examples.english: In ancient texts, scholars discussed the evolution of 㚇.
